did.unittitle:
Jeffersonian Society (University of Michigan) records books
1864-1915
did.abstract: Student debating society of the University of Michigan Law School; records include Minutes, and secretary’s book containing lists of members and fellows in addition to constitutions and by-laws

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

accruals.p: Periodic additions to the records expected.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open without restriction

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Jeffersonian Society (University of Michigan) records books, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Student debating society of the University of Michigan Law School.

scopecontent.p: The Jeffersonian Society records consist of minutes, and secretary’s book containing lists of members and fellows in addition to constitutions and by-laws.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Debates and debating--Michigan--Ann Arbor.
controlaccess.corpname: University of Michigan. Dept. of Law.

note.p: (includes lists of members, constitution and by-laws, and minutes 1898-1901)
